data.title: MAH: Minimum Atmospheric Height
data.name: MAH
data.description: Calculate the posterior distribution of the "minimum atmospheric height" (MAH) of an exoplanet by inputting the joint posterior distribution of the mass and radius.

evidence: "Fortran 90 code for calculating the Minimum Atmospheric Height (MAH) of an exoplanet."

"This tarball contains two Fortran 90 files: {1} MAH.f90 = the module which computes R_MAH {2} MAH_call.f90 = example calling code. The code may be compiled together using... g95 -O3 -c MAH.f90 && g95 -O3 -o MAH MAH_call.f90 MAH.o and the code can be executed using... ./MAH"
"A typical use of these outputs would be to create a histogram of the second column ... which would represent the posterior distribution of the minimum atmospheric height of the planet"
